messages.subject: Efu Tachi mounted Katana for sale
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Guys, I ll be listing this Efu Tachi mounted katana on ebay in a couple of days.  We don t see these types of mounts very often - if ever really.  The
messages.messageBody:
Hi Guys,

I'll be listing this Efu Tachi mounted katana on ebay in a couple of
days. We don't see these types of mounts very often - if ever
really. The carving work is very intricate, and this is a pretty
old set. The blade is very old with 4 holes in the nakago, it is
signed Yoshimitsu, but the signature has been welded on. It also
has a few openings on the surface.

I will have a more detailed description on ebay. If you have any
questions please feel free to ask, I also have many pictures of it.

Here is a link to some pictures:

http://members.rogers.com/rskeboa170/efu/index.html

Regards,

Louis
